products.name: Plum Green Tea Pore Cleansing Face Wash (75 ml)
products.desc: You will love the gently foaming, refreshing experience of this face wash, coupled with the mild exfoliation and an unbeatable green tea fragrance that leaves you feeling refreshed and energized. Especially suitable for acne prone skin, with goodness of glycolic acid and green tea to keep acne at bay.
products.about_brand: Plum is India's foremost 100% vegan beauty brand, with a defined purpose of adding goodness to the world we live in. Inspired by global best practices in safe natural cosmetics and beauty solutions, Plum is focused on restoring and maintaining your skin, hair, and body as nature made it be. Designed in a London studio, Plum products are 100% vegan and cruelty-free. Besides being PETA-certified vegan & cruelty-free, Plum products are always free of parabens, phthalates, Propylene Glycol, SLS, PABA, DEA, and other harmful chemicals. Marrying science and product expertise with an innate love for nature, welcome to Plum. Take in the goodness!

products.desc: The world is slowly switching to eco-friendly products; why not take the plunge into natural beauty as well? Good Vibes is formulated with natural ingredients extracted from fruit and plant pigments and presented to you in a cute small bottle. The result: a range of genuine and effective personal care products. Whatever you are looking for, we have a wide range of products that do as much good for your health as Mother Nature. products.about_brand:
Lotus Herbals is India’s leading natural cosmetics company. It has combined ancient wisdom from the Vedas with 21st century technology and offers a wide range of over 250 skin care, hair care, sun care and make-up products.
All of the production systems are subject to stringent quality checks to ensure highest quality products that match or exceed international standards.
